passive_1: Dash 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 100 (+ 10% AP) magic damage to enemies hit (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

Dash 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 50% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 175 – 250 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 50% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
motd: Bugfix: Projectiles no longer goes through champion-created terrain.

passive_1: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 200 – 300 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 75% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
passive_2: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.

passive_1: Dash forward and unleash a nova of fire bolts that deal 75 – 150 (based on level) (+ 25% AP) as magic damage (40 second cooldown, shared with other Hextech items). Champions and monsters hit by multiple fire bolts take 10% damage per additional bolt.

motd: Change: Protobelt's dash now disables spellcasts and channels for the duration

passive_1: Dash forward and unleash a nova of fire bolts that deal 75 – 150 (based on level) (+ 35% AP) as magic damage (40 second cooldown, shared with other Hextech items). Champions and monsters hit by multiple fire bolts take 20% damage per additional bolt.
